headline: Barclays Maintains a Sell Rating on Charter Communications (CHTR)
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) is one of the best most oversold large cap stocks so far in 2025. In a report released on October 1, Kannan Venkateshwar from Barclays maintained a Sell rating on Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) and set a price target of $275.00. Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHTR) reported its fiscal Q2 results on […]
